attributes.additional_details: We want to make it easier for claimants to get on pip. We want the assessment to be made easier to pass. So many have been told to find work. When they are not fit for work. We want the eligability criteria increased so that we can get more people on pip. So many have been declared fit for work and then commited suicide we want to stop this happening. It is hard enough for disabled people to live without bringing in the prospect of work. Atos earns large salerys while disabled struggle to get put on a good allowance it is not right we need to make it right.
